column2:
"...Okay, did you get all that? In case you
didn't, here it is in layman's terms."

"You will get permission to search
a new area if you clear
the specified quest within 40 minutes.'"

"That's all there is to it, really.
There's nothing else.
It all depends on you."

"Whether or not you take this test is completely
up to you. My job is merely to evaluate your
performance."
